summary: More realistic sunglares with more \"flares\" than the normal texture.
descriptionHtml:
ReAL Sun - insane0h Realistic Sunglare

Also, check out my YouTube channel for Skyrim mod reviews with commentary here:

http://www.youtube.com/insane0hflex


My personal twist on the sunglare in skyrim.  I found the default texture to be somewhat lacking in a realistic sense, so I added a lot more beams. (I stared into the sun today to get even MORE realistic, this is what it looks like. none of that erroneous, unrealistic lens flare effects)

Textures used - fxwhiteglare.dds and the default sunglare.dds and some other personal photoshop tweaks.

Videos and more pictures soon coming - please be patient! I can only do certain things so fast!

:::Installation:::

Simply extract to the correct pathways - 
Extract to
skyrim\\data

:::Unistallation:::

Simply delete the file sunglare.dds in skyrim\\data\\textures\\sky\\

PLease check out my other mod(s) as well please - 
ReAL Water - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=862



[img]http://i.imgur.com/AIuLH.jpg[/img]
author: sval
